display_long_description:
🌟 Dive into the thrilling world of Infinite Flag, a fast-paced multiplayer VR experience packed with variety, action, and endless fun! Whether you’re chasing victory or just hanging out with friends, Infinite Flag delivers immersive gameplay across multiple game modes, each offering unique challenges and adventures.

🔥 Capture The Flag – Teamwork and strategy collide in adrenaline-fueled matches. Steal the enemy’s flag, defend your own, and outsmart opponents in arenas built for intense, heart-pounding action.
🔫 Laser Tag – Gear up for futuristic shootouts where reflexes, precision, and quick thinking make all the difference. The glowing arenas and high-tech blasters create a competitive atmosphere like no other.
👻 Horror – Face your fears in eerie, suspenseful environments where every sound and shadow keeps you on edge. Can you survive the nightmare?
🧗 Only Up – Scale massive obstacle towers and defy gravity in this vertical parkour challenge. Every climb is a test of skill and determination—one wrong move and it’s back to the start.
🛠️ Sandbox – Build, experiment, and explore in a mode where creativity has no limits. Hang out with friends or create chaotic physics experiments—the choice is yours.

With VR-optimized controls, frequent updates, and tons of customization, Infinite Flag is more than just a game—it’s a growing universe of competition, creativity, and connection. Grab your headset, rally your squad, and make your mark in Infinite Flag!
